A lone traveler discovers a magical artifact that allows them to communicate with the spirits of the land.
A group of rebels overthrow an oppressive government and bring peace to the Land of Everlasting Night.
A group of explorers uncover a ancient ruin hidden beneath the surface of the Land of Everlasting Night.
A group of scientists discover a new form of energy source beneath the surface of the Land of Everlasting Night.
A group of treasure hunters discover a hidden treasure trove beneath the surface of the Land of Everlasting Night.
